page.title: 11Canal Fishing. ELLESMERE
page.content: In the canal you can either float fish or ledger.The kind of fish you are likely to catch are Gudgin, Roach, Dace, Rough, Perch and Eels.The sort of thing you would take with you are a fishing rod,reel,two pound line, size 18 hook ,lead weights and float or ledger.You could use worms,maggots or casters for bait.You could also use bread.Bread is very good for dace.You could use a swim feeder which is a tube with holes in it which fills with maggots. The maggots wriggle so it acts as a form of ground bait. A rodrest is a thin metal pole with a plastic V shape on top which rests part of your rod.A swing tip is placed on the end of your rod. It will swing from side to side when you have a bite.
